title: How Hobby Lobby Funded Terrorism And Tried To Destroy Democracy
itunes:title: How Hobby Lobby Funded Terrorism And Tried To Destroy Democracy
description:
Robert is joined by Cody Johnston to discuss Hobby Lobby.


FOOTNOTES:

  1. Meet David Green: Hobby Lobby's Biblical Billionaire
  2. Some thoughts on the Hobby Lobby antiquities case
  3. Hobby Lobby’s Legal Expert Speaks: “I can’t rule out…they used my advice to evade the law.”
  4. The Green collection and the Museum of the Bible: 443,000 square meters of mess
  5. Dispelling the Myths Around the Hobby Lobby Antiquities Case
  6. DID HOBBY LOBBY’S C.E.O. UNKNOWINGLY SPONSOR TERRORISM?
  7. How much money has ISIS made selling antiquities? More than enough to fund its attacks.
  8. Mission From God: The Upstart Christian Sect Driving Invisible Children and Changing Africa
  9. America’s Biggest Christian Charity Funnels Tens of Millions to Hate Groups
  10. Hobby Lobby: Who is David Green? 9 facts telling you everything you need to know about the evangelical entrepreneur
  11. 5 things to know about Hobby Lobby’s owners
  12. Hobby Lobby Allegedly Fired Employee Due to Pregnancy
  13. Bad Boss: Yes, Hobby Lobby’s Steve Green Does Want You To Live By His Religion’s Rules
  14. How the Hobby Lobby ruling helped and hurt religious freedom
  15. Column: The Supreme Court’s awful Hobby Lobby decision just spawned a very ugly stepchild
  16. Aftermath of the Hobby Lobby Decision


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
